whatIsService.title: What Is Microneedling?
whatIsService.content:
Microneedling is a minimally invasive skin treatment that uses fine, medical-grade needles to create controlled micro-injuries in the skin. These stimulate the body’s natural healing response, boosting collagen and elastin production the key proteins responsible for smooth, firm, youthful-looking skin.

It is one of the most trusted dermatologist-recommended treatments worldwide for:

- Acne scars & stretch marks
- Enlarged pores
- Fine lines & wrinkles
- Uneven skin tone
- Dull or rough skin texture

At The Skin Firm, we often pair microneedling with microdermabrasion a gentle exfoliation technique that polishes away dead cells from the surface. While microneedling works from within, microdermabrasion enhances results by refining the outermost skin layer for a complete rejuvenation.

questions.question: Is microneedling painful?
questions.answer: No numbing cream is applied, making the treatment comfortable.

questions.question: How long does a session take?
questions.answer: Around 45-60 minutes depending on the treatment area.

questions.question: When will I see results?
questions.answer: You may notice a glow within a week, with visible improvement in scars and texture after 3-4 sessions.

questions.question: How many sessions are needed?
questions.answer: Usually 4-6 sessions spaced 4-6 weeks apart for best results.

questions.question: Can microneedling be combined with PRP or serums?
questions.answer: Yes these boost healing, collagen production, and glow.

questions.question: Is it safe for all skin tones?
questions.answer: Yes when performed by a trained skin specialist, it is safe for all Indian skin types.

questions.question: What’s the difference between microneedling and microdermabrasion?
questions.answer: Microneedling works deeper by stimulating collagen, while microdermabrasion is surface-level exfoliation. We often combine both for enhanced results.

questions.question: Is there downtime?
questions.answer: Only mild redness and sensitivity for 1–2 days, easily manageable with sunscreen and moisturiser.

questions.question: Can men also do microneedling?
questions.answer: Absolutely many male patients choose it for scars and pore reduction.

questions.question: Are results permanent?
questions.answer: Scars and texture improve long-term, but maintenance sessions every 6-12 months are recommended.
